summary: Implemented reusable Back/Next controls with a centralized flow order, added a reusable GIF component with graceful fallback rendering, updated multiple Valentine screens to include GIFs and Back/Next controls, and extended centralized strings with new navigation and fallback labels.

hallucinated_features.description: Added chevron icons (left/right) to the Back/Next navigation buttons.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 specifies persistent Back/Next controls and centralized labels, but does not request icons or specific iconography.
